content: 3 5mm / e / 4 round 16 20 chain 1 tight fpdc in same st bpdc in next st *fpdc bpdc* around slip_stitch in first double_crochet 84 double_crochet round 21 chain 1 tight reverse single_crochet in each st around slip_stitch in first single_crochet fasten_off and weave in ends this pattern is for non-commercial use only and not for reproduction publication and distribution you can sell any items made from the pattern and it would be much appreciated if you use the pattern link to your product thank you © 25 feb 2017 - grace d penny page 2
